name: Terrorist Modern Strike
description:
The military base town where you are located is occupied by terrorists. Now, as you are a Combat Shooter warrior trained, your job is to encounter the all the terrorists in discreet. In this combat battlefield, your territory has been attacked by warrior’s battlefield vehicular and most powerful shooting equipment. Fight as frontier commando and Kill the terrorist; prevent terrorist strike with crisis action fighting.

Features:
-A lot of heavy and advanced weapons
-Easy controls & real combat effects
-Fast-paced anti-terrorist fps experience
-Thrilling high quality sound
-Can be Play without internet
-Top action level realistic battlefield environment
